text: Canadian Rocky Mountain Parks is a UNESCO World Heritage Site in the Canadian Rockies. There are seven parks in the site, including four national parks: *Banff National Park *Jasper National Park *Kootenay National Park *Yoho National Park and three British Columbia provincial parks: *Hamber Provincial Park *Mount Assiniboine Provincial Park *Mount Robson Provincial Park They became a World Heritage Site in 1984. The Burgess Shale site is also part of it, which was a World Heritage site on its own between 1980 and 1984. ==References== Category:Canadian Rockies Category:National parks in Canada Category:Parks in the Canadian Rockies Category:World Heritage Sites in Canada
title: Canadian Rocky Mountain Parks World Heritage Site
